word: Some of the Pharisees had come to Jesus demanding \93when the kingdom of God should come\94 (Luke 17:20). More than three years had passed since John the Baptist gave the message that like a trumpet call had sounded through the land, \93The kingdom of heaven is at hand\94 (Matthew 3:2). And as yet these Pharisees saw no indication of the establishment of the kingdom. . . .
